original_text: To Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided, and his brother's name was Joktan.
korean_text: 에벨은 두 아들을 낳고 하나의 이름을 벨렉이라 하였으니 그 때에 세상이 나뉘었음이요 벨렉의 아우의 이름은 욕단이며

sentences.original_text: To Eber were born two sons:
the name of the one was Peleg,
for in his days the earth was divided,
and his brother's name was Joktan.
